name: Lab Runner
description:
Game Description: Lab Runner is a game in which your character is desperately trying to flee from the facility in which they've been held by a mysterious and sinister organization intent on dissecting you.

Escape through the facility tunnels in a bid for freedom, using both your innate powers and various items and tools you pick up along the way to bash through, jump over, and slide under the various obstacles and equipment in your path.

Time is of the essence, even one small mistake could cost you your freedom forever. 

_____________________________________________________________________
